database.name: Microsoft SQL Server
database.recordCountQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ?
database.recordDeletionQuery: DELETE FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ?
database.recordMergeQuery: MERGE {{TABLE_NAME}} AS dest USING (SELECT ?, ?, ?) AS src (timestamp, data, record_id) ON (dest.record_id = src.record_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET timestamp = src.timestamp, data = src.data WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(timestamp, data, record_id) VALUES (src.timestamp, src.data, src.record_id);
database.recordUpdateQuery: UPDATE {{TABLE_NAME}} SET timestamp = ?, data = ? WHERE record_id = ?
database.recordRetrievalQuery: SELECT record_id, timestamp, data FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY record_id) AS rownumber, record_id, timestamp, data FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ?) AS A WHERE A.rownumber <= ? AND A.rownumber > ?
database.recordRetrievalWithIdsQuery: SELECT record_id, timestamp, data FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE record_id IN ({{RECORD_IDS}})

recordTableInitQueries.query: CREATE TABLE {{TABLE_NAME}} (record_id VARCHAR(50), timestamp BIGINT, data VARBINARY(max), PRIMARY KEY(record_id))

database.fsUpdateDataPathQuery: UPDATE AN_FS_DATA SET path = ? WHERE path = ?
database.fsFileLengthRetrievalQuery: SELECT length FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE path = ?
database.fsListFilesQuery: SELECT path FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE parent_path = ?
database.fsReadDataChunkQuery: SELECT data FROM AN_FS_DATA WHERE path = ? AND sequence = ?
database.fsSetFileLengthQuery: UPDATE AN_FS_PATH SET length = ? WHERE path = ?

fsTableInitQueries.query: CREATE TABLE AN_FS_PATH (path VARCHAR(256), is_directory BIT, length BIGINT, parent_path VARCHAR(256), PRIMARY KEY(path), FOREIGN KEY (parent_path) REFERENCES AN_FS_PATH(path))
CREATE TABLE AN_FS_DATA (path VARCHAR(256), sequence BIGINT, data VARBINARY(max), PRIMARY KEY (path,sequence), FOREIGN KEY (path) REFERENCES AN_FS_PATH(path) ON DELETE CASCADE)

database.fsTablesCheckQuery: SELECT path FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE path = '/'
database.fsUpdateDataChunkQuery: UPDATE AN_FS_DATA SET data = ? WHERE path = ? AND sequence = ?
database.fsMergeDataChunkQuery: MERGE AN_FS_DATA AS dest USING (SELECT ?, ?, ?) AS src (path, sequence, data) ON (dest.path = src.path AND dest.sequence = src.sequence) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET data = src.data WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(path, sequence, data) VALUES (src.path, src.sequence, src.data);
